titleStmt.title: The countrey farmer: or, The buxome virgin. To a new tune, called, New-Market, or King James's jigg;

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for P. Brooksby, at the Golden-Ball in Pye-Corner,

notesStmt.note: Verse: "There was a brisk lass both bonny and brown ..."
Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University, Houghton Library and the British Library.
